Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Wizard

Class Wizard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Wizard.Wizard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Wizard extends Object implements Serializable
Wizard is the class who is related to the username of the Player and manage to play the assistant's card and move the Student from the Entrance of the Board
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Wizard

      public Wizard(String username, int limitOfStudentInEntrance, int numOfStudentMovable)
      THis is the constructor of the Wizard Class, it needs the username of the player, the limit of number of students allowed in the entrance of the board and the number of students movable during a round
      Parameters:
      username - is the username of the player
      limitOfStudentInEntrance - is the limit of number of students allowed in the entrance of the board
      numOfStudentMovable - is number of students movable during a round

    • playAssistantsCard

      public void playAssistantsCard(AssistantsCards assistantsCard, Collection<AssistantsCards> playedCardsByOpponent) throws ExceptionGame
      The method manage the case either the card is playable or not, the methode use the method playableAssistantsCard to assure that the card selected by the player is playable and procede to invoke setRoundAssistantsCard, otherwise throws Exception
      Parameters:
      assistantsCard - is the Card the Player wants to play
      playedCardsByOpponent - are the assistant's card already played by the opponents
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is the Exception thrown when it is not possibile to play the card choose by the player

    • playableAssistantsCard

      public boolean playableAssistantsCard(AssistantsCards assistantsCard, Collection<AssistantsCards> playedCardsByOpponent)
      This method returns true if the card selected by the player can be actually played. This method invoke the method checkIfAssistantsCardAlreadyPlayer and checkIfAssistantsCardAlreadyPlayed
      Parameters:
      assistantsCard - is the Card the Player wants to play
      playedCardsByOpponent - are the assistant's card already played by the opponents
      Returns:
      if the card is playable the method returns true

    • checkIfAssistantsCardAlreadyPlayed

      public boolean checkIfAssistantsCardAlreadyPlayed(AssistantsCards assistantsCard, Collection<AssistantsCards> playedCardsByOpponent)
      This method return true if the card selected by the player is already played by an opponent in the same round
      Parameters:
      assistantsCard - is the Card the Player wants to play
      playedCardsByOpponent - are the assistant's card already played by the opponent
      Returns:
      if the card is already played by an opponent, the method returns true

    • checkIfThereIsAlternativeAssistantsCard

      public boolean checkIfThereIsAlternativeAssistantsCard(Collection<AssistantsCards> playedCardsByOpponent)
      This method return true if in the player has playable cards which aren't already played by the opponent
      Parameters:
      playedCardsByOpponent - are the assistant's card already played by the opponent
      Returns:
      if in the deck of the Wizard there is an assistant's card different from the cards already played by the opponents, the method returns true

    • placeStudentOnArchipelago

      public void placeStudentOnArchipelago(Student student, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame
      This method, with the help of the method checkIfStudentIsMovable(Student s), places the student of the player on the archipelago selected by the player if possible, otherwise throws an Exception
      Parameters:
      student - is the student that the player wants to move
      archipelago - is the archipelago where the player wants to place his student
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - if the student can't be moved

    • placeStudentOnTable

      public void placeStudentOnTable(Student student) throws ExceptionGame
      This method place the student passed, if movable, on the relative Table (based by its color), otherwise throws Exception the method used the method checkIfStudentIsMovable.
      Parameters:
      student - is the Student which the player wants to place on the table of the board
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - if the student can't be moved

    • checkIfStudentIsMovable

      public boolean checkIfStudentIsMovable(Student student) throws ExceptionGame
      this method return true if the students pass is movable, otherwise throws exception
      Parameters:
      student - is the Student that the player wants to move
      Returns:
      true if the student is movable
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - if the student is not in the board entrance or if the player has reach the number of movable students

    • placeStudentInEntrance

      public void placeStudentInEntrance(Collection<Student> students)
      This method place the collection of students passed in the entrance of the board
      Parameters:
      students - is the collection of student to add in the entrance of the board
